about_the_game:
A short demo for everyone to get a sense of how the game plays and a tiny scratch of what is to be expected in the game. It is merely a preview of what could be in the full game showing a few of the possible game routes.

Key features

Level challenge system preview where you can take on from the very beginning a higher difficulty short stage.
Evolution system to upgrade the style you love the most
Power ups to boost you stats temporary
1 mini-boss to test your skill against and amuse yourself while at it

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit) or newer (64 bit) Windows OS
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760, AMD Radeon R9 270X, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0+ GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 470, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
